title: Breathing Into Better Sex
itunes:title: Breathing Into Better Sex
itunes:subtitle: On today’s show, Dr. Emily is giving you a little exercise in mindfulness – because being present in your body helps you in the bedroom. Plus, she’s answering your questions. She discusses how breathing into your senses may be the key to...
description:
On today’s show, Dr. Emily is giving you a little exercise in mindfulness – because being present in your body helps you in the bedroom. Plus, she’s answering your questions.

She discusses how breathing into your senses may be the key to better sex, what to do if you’re getting jealous in your open relationship, and how to get your partner to see why communication is a lubrication – and not a threat to your sex life. 


Follow Emily on all social: @sexwithemily

For even more sex talk, tips, & tricks visit sexwithemily.com


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
